name: Slim Download List
description:
Makes the Firefox (3.0 and up) download list vertically slim. I recommend making the window larger so it's usable. This style should work reasonably on Linux and Windows with default dpi settings. Not tested on Mac.

Changelog
• 0.1.1 Use userstyles setting for stripe option
• 0.1 Initial release to userstyles.org
